rules.rule: Wait for at least 2-3 consecutive same-color daily candles before entering a trade
rules.evidence: 4 out of 6 wins were preceded by 2-3 same-color candle confirmation

rules.rule: Set stop-loss at 1.5 to 2 times the daily ATR
rules.evidence: Losses reduced by 25% when stops were set wider

rules.rule: Avoid entries during low volatility consolidation (ATR < 0.5)
rules.evidence: 6 out of 8 losses occurred in low ATR periods
